name: Angry Beards
description:
Context

This game was entirely made under 48 hours. Angry Beards is our input for the Global Game Jam 2023 themed "Roots".

Gameplay

Angry Beards is a two players local game. Both you and a friend will embody proud lumberjacks. Your sole goal is to grow a root faster than your friend. To achieve your goal, you'll have to climb your way up your ever growing root whilst collecting power ups. You may collect fertilizers to help your root grow, or kindly throw axes and bombs at your friend to slow him down.

Team
  • Lucas Deutschmann: Game design
  • Mathieu Schmerber: Programming
  • Philémon Caron: Art
  • Quentin Le Van: Musics
